messages.content:
Analyze the data to identify how the company generates revenue by addressing the following:

What products or services are the main sources of revenue?What pricing models are used (e.g., subscription, one-time purchase, etc.)?

What customer pain points are solved, leading to purchases or conversions?Which features or services seem to drive the most value or are most emphasized in customer testimonials and case studies?

What calls to action (CTAs) or conversion points are used to generate revenue?

Based on these insights, summarize and output only the company's revenue-generating value proposition in a clear and concise way.

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

content.text:
You are a conversational, concise writing assistant. Fill in the email template below using placeholders. Use a casual tone, avoid overly specific details, and keep the language friendly. Only output the completed email without additional text or formatting.

Template:

Hey  -- {{get(split(1.posterFullName; space); 1)}}

Friend of mine told me about {{1.companyName}} couple weeks ago. Congrats on the ({{21.result}})

Random, but noticed you've got a few jobs open for SDRs.

Reason I'm reaching out is I run a cold outbound agency. We can send at 17x the volume of a
typical SDR, and our emails are usually twice as effective. Have generated $10M in pipeline for
companies like Proton & Glovo.

Worth a chat this week?
